value.0:
This book seems to entail an amount of knowledge on the topic of creating magical traps.

All magical traps require a trap creation kit, a substrate of gold pieces considered to power the magical effects, and craft wondrous item feat to in order to create them.

Magical spell scrolls are incorporated into the trap creation kit.

Burning hands scroll is a favorite; it enables concentrated flames in a strong fire trap.

Searing light produces a directed strong holy trap; another less popular innovation incorporates negative energy burst spell into a potent strong negative energy trap.
